summary: Provides seamless integration between PyTorch Lightning and Weights & Biases by creating a W&B run for each training session and offering a unified interface to log metrics, hyperparameters, model topology, gradients, and various media types (images, audio, video, text, tables). It also handles automatic checkpoint artifact logging, artifact download/use, and run configuration, supporting both online and offline modes.
